rows.label: qst201904_msg0001
rows.name:
This...this much?! Are
you sure about this?

rows.label: qst201904_msg0002
rows.name: Take it.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0003
rows.name:
It is our policy never to
overlook a lady in trouble.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0004
rows.name:
You realize I'm the
one paying up here...

rows.label: qst201904_msg0005
rows.name:
Cease your whining, Rex! It is
not becoming of a gentleman!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0006
rows.name:
That should suffice for the
time being, should it not? You
may use it as you see fit.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0007
rows.name:
I...I don't know what to say...
Thank you! Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0008
rows.name: Yes... We have decided!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0009
rows.name: Dare I ask... What've you decided?

rows.label: qst201904_msg0010
rows.name:
We have observed that the
child will one day mature
into a beautiful butterfly.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0011
rows.name:
She shall be given a free
pass into our entourage!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0012
rows.name:
In which case, we must turn
back this instant, and-

rows.label: qst201904_msg0013
rows.name: Please, wait...

rows.label: qst201904_msg0014
rows.name:
Maybe before all that, it
important to search for
Nopon that tricked Rinne?

rows.label: qst201904_msg0015
rows.name: Oh! You are quite right!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0016
rows.name:
You bestow sage advice,
dear Hana! We would expect
nothing less of you!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0017
rows.name:
Still, it seems we are all
but groping in the dark now.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0018
rows.name:
We shall have to locate an area
where Nopon congregate and
press them for information.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0019
rows.name: Yes! To the Avaritia Guild we go!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0020
rows.name:
There are an abundance of Nopon
merchants there. Surely we will
find the lead we seek.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0021
rows.name:
If all goes well, we may
even be able to meet the
black-feathered villain.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0022
rows.name:
Your monarch has spoken! We
make for Avaritia immediately!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0023
rows.name:
I'm not sure it'll be that easy...
Goldmund's a big place, you know.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0024
rows.name: Fear not. They are but cretins.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0025
rows.name:
He will surely have disembarked
at Goldmund Return Port. We shall
find him skulking around there!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0026
rows.name: And now we depart! Follow our lead!
